Welcome To My Portfolio!

Hello! I am a Master’s student in Data Science at Indiana University with a strong interest in econometrics, machine learning, algorithms, statistics, and scalable systems. I enjoy building production-quality models and data pipelines that analyze economic patterns and generate actionable forecasts. I am actively seeking full-time roles in data science, risk analytics, data engineering, or related fields, where I can apply modeling and engineering skills to real-world problems.
